org.apache.lucene.util.hnsw
Navigable Small-World graph, nominally Hierarchical but currently only has a single layer.

    Description
    CloseableRandomVectorScorerSupplier
    A supplier that creates UpdateableRandomVectorScorer from an ordinal.
    HnswGraph
    Hierarchical Navigable Small World graph.
    RandomVectorScorer
    A RandomVectorScorer for scoring random nodes in batches against an abstract query.
    RandomVectorScorerSupplier
    A supplier that creates RandomVectorScorer from an ordinal.
    UpdateableRandomVectorScorer
    Just like a RandomVectorScorer but allows the scoring ordinal to be changed.

  • Classes in org.apache.lucene.util.hnsw used by org.apache.lucene.search
    Class
    Description
    NeighborQueue
    NeighborQueue uses a LongHeap to store lists of arcs in an HNSW graph, represented as a neighbor node id with an associated score packed together as a sortable long, which is sorted primarily by score.
  • Classes in org.apache.lucene.util.hnsw used by org.apache.lucene.search.knn
    Class
    Description
    BlockingFloatHeap
    A blocking bounded min heap that stores floats.
  • Classes in org.apache.lucene.util.hnsw used by org.apache.lucene.util.hnsw
    Class
    Description
    FilteredHnswGraphSearcher
    Searches an HNSW graph to find nearest neighbors to a query vector.
    HnswBuilder
    Interface for builder building the OnHeapHnswGraph
    HnswGraph
    Hierarchical Navigable Small World graph.
    HnswGraph.NodesIterator
    Iterator over the graph nodes on a certain level.
    HnswGraphBuilder
    Builder for HNSW graph.
    HnswGraphBuilder.GraphBuilderKnnCollector
    A restricted, specialized knnCollector that can be used when building a graph.
    HnswGraphMerger
    Abstraction of merging multiple graphs into one on-heap graph
    HnswGraphSearcher
    Searches an HNSW graph to find nearest neighbors to a query vector.
    IncrementalHnswGraphMerger
    This merges multiple graphs in a single thread in incremental fashion.
    IncrementalHnswGraphMerger.GraphReader
    Represents a vector reader that contains graph info.
    InitializedHnswGraphBuilder
    This creates a graph builder that is initialized with the provided HnswGraph.
    IntToIntFunction
    Native int to int function
    MergingHnswGraphBuilder
    A graph builder that is used during segments' merging.
    NeighborArray
    NeighborArray encodes the neighbors of a node and their mutual scores in the HNSW graph as a pair of growable arrays.
    NeighborQueue
    NeighborQueue uses a LongHeap to store lists of arcs in an HNSW graph, represented as a neighbor node id with an associated score packed together as a sortable long, which is sorted primarily by score.
    OnHeapHnswGraph
    An HnswGraph where all nodes and connections are held in memory.
    RandomVectorScorer
    A RandomVectorScorer for scoring random nodes in batches against an abstract query.
    RandomVectorScorerSupplier
    A supplier that creates RandomVectorScorer from an ordinal.
    UpdateableRandomVectorScorer
    Just like a RandomVectorScorer but allows the scoring ordinal to be changed.
